mapper.sql: SELECT au_role.`name` roleName, au_role.`status` roleStatus, au_permission.`name` permissionName, au_user_role.user_uid userUid, au_permission.path path, au_user.username username FROM au_role, au_permission, au_role_permission, au_user_role LEFT JOIN au_user ON au_user.uid = au_user_role.user_uid WHERE au_role.uid = au_role_permission.role_uid AND au_role_permission.permission_uid = au_permission.uid AND au_user_role.role_uid = au_role.uid
mapper.select: SELECT au_role.uid, au_role.`name`, user_uid, au_role.`status`, au_role.create_time, au_role.update_time, au_user_role.update_time FROM au_user_role, au_role WHERE au_user_role.user_uid=#{uid} and au_role.uid=au_user_role.role_uid

SELECT au_role.name roleName, au_role.status roleStatus, au_permission.path, au_permission.name permissionName FROM au_role, au_role_permission, au_permission WHERE au_role.uid = au_role_permission.role_uid AND au_permission.uid = au_role_permission.permission_uid AND au_role.uid = #{roleUid};
